segments.text: not really . I was being sarcastic . Does it come with the job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yes , everyone on the sales floor has to wear one . They're supposed to make us look more professional .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: they're not actually that bad . They could be worse . What do you think about it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't mind it , actually . I don't have to worry about what I'm going to wear every day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: so are you enjoying your new job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: it's much better than my old one . My new boss is great .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: how do you like working in sales ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like the fact that I get to work with people . It makes the day go by much faster .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that's good . Have you met Jane yet ? She's the intern in the international travel department .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yeah , I've met her . She's a genius saleswoman !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know ! She could sell fridges to Eskimos !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: why didn't you tell me about that before ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't know . I didn't think it was that interesting .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: well , now that I know that , maybe we should all go out for dinner sometime .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that's a good idea . Let's discuss after work .
segments.speaker: S1
